greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Zero-based weighted sum of compositions in standard order.
comment: The standard order of compositions is given by A066099.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..14, flattened
formula: For a composition b(1),...,b(k), a(n) = Sum_{i=1}^k (i-1) b(i).
results.author: _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Nov 06 2006
